name: Masked Deuce
text: On Play: If your Leader is [Portgas D. Ace], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 1 [Portgas D. Ace] or Red Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
